amendment.description: Amendment provides $2 million to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Fisheries Operational Account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide an additional $2 million (by transfer) for the West Coast commercial salmon industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (CA) amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
